name: Bubble Shooter Z
description:
Bubble Shooter Z - A brand new exciting bubble shooting puzzle game.
A zombie outbreak is a fact. Have you been scared; Are you afraid;
Zombies are more scared than you. Zombia, our hero, have lost all his friends. They have been killed by angry farmers.

Zombia, needs your help to release his defeated friends. Make a long dystopic journey bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game. Various weapons will be available. Use them with causion.

Bubble Shooter Z is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

So...
Don't kill the zombies...
Help them...to RIP...


Features:

• Match bubbles of the same colour to pop them in this comik-scary shooting adventure
• High level detailed gfx and sound effects, great animation
• Spellbinding game mode and unforgetable characters!
• Release the RIP.
• Special booster bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
• Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
• Available to play on iPhone and iPad devices
• iOS 8,9,10,11 support
